Title: Erratum: The Drosophila transcriptional network is structured by microbiota [BMC Genomics, 17, (2016), (975)]
Abstract: © The Author(s).In this version of this article that was originally published [1] there were errors with figure 1a with certain labels missing and other labels being misaligned. The original article was corrected. The publisher apologises for these errors.
